title: Bug 47910ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
OB: When compiling with the 'ajc' command and using the 'outjar' option to create a .jar file, the resulting file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The 'ajc' command with the 'outjar' option should create a valid .jar file that contains a MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Call the 'ajc' command with the 'sourceroots' parameter set to '<mydir>', the 'outjar' parameter set to '<my.jar>'. 2. Check the output file to verify that it contains a valid .jar file structure with a MANIFEST.MF file inside.
